duties_responsibilities.duty: Guiding and applying the Scrum Framework and Kanban Method in growing high-performing teams.
Coaching and guiding Lean/Agile team journeys in the context of IT infrastructure/operations work.
Receiving and acting on constructive feedback and advice with a growth mindset.
Facilitating excellent written, verbal, and virtual communication in a team environment.
Managing time effectively and triaging issues with prompt action.
Diving into details when applicable, asking probing questions, and enabling the team's growth through actionable insights.

education_certification.credential: Certifications such as LeanKanban University's TKP, Scrum.org's PSM, Scrum Alliance's CSM
